long_description: Built to fit both body and budget, the multiday REI Yosemite 75 Pack features the REI Flex-Fit suspension, which maximizes comfort by letting you adjust the fit multiple ways. REI Flex-Fit suspension lets you adjust both the hipbelt length and pad placement to maximize comfort; it also has a simple torso-length adjustment system. Forward-pull hipbelt can be easily tightened as you hike; over-the-top compression strap snugs loads close. Bottom compartment's access zipper is extra wide to accommodate bulky items; buckle-close flaps help compress the load; inner divider separates bottom section from main pack. Water bottles can be twist-locked in place in the side pockets; angled pocket openings offer easy access. Large mesh stash pocket in front is roomy enough to accommodate a jacket or other bulky gear. Hydration-compatible design accepts most popular types of reservoirs (sold separately); you can route the sip tube over either shoulder. Quick-clip tool loops and multiple lash loops make it easy to haul additional gear. Hipbelt pockets are handy for trail essentials. Sternum strap includes a built-in safety whistle. For added durability, the Yosemite 75 Pack has waterproof and abrasion-resistant fabric on the bottom.
short_description: Built to fit both body and budget, the multiday REI Yosemite 75 Pack features the REI Flex-Fit suspension, which maximizes comfort by letting you adjust the fit multiple ways.
